short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate and copy Boolean strings for advanced browser searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension, designed to generate and copy Boolean strings for advanced browser searches, empowers users to optimize their search results with precision and ease. Whether you're conducting detailed research, filtering through vast amounts of information, or simply refining your everyday searches, this tool streamlines the process by automatically creating complex Boolean strings tailored to your needs. By installing this extension, you'll save time, enhance search accuracy, and gain greater control over the content you discover online, making it an indispensable tool for professionals, students, and anyone who values efficient and effective online searches.
